thread.title: Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley

title: Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley
text:
Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley FILE PHOTO / THE MORNING CALL Vistit the Norfolk Azalea Festival, International Tatto Show and more. Trips are offered by St. Jane's Trips & Tours and St. Joseph’s Prime Time. Vistit the Norfolk Azalea Festival, International Tatto Show and more. Trips are offered by St. Jane's Trips & Tours and St. Joseph’s Prime Time. (FILE PHOTO / THE MORNING CALL) Enjoy a day trip and support a nonprofit organization 
DAY TRIPPIN' 
•Neue Gallery and Met, New York City, Nov. 7. Museums: $20 each; bus: $32. St. Thomas More Church, Lori, 484-951-0440. 
•New York City, time on your own, Dec. 5. $28. Lehigh Valley Dental Hygienists' Association, Millie, 610-867-6630. 
•Christmas Spectacular, Radio City, Dec. 3. $130. Hellertown Area Library, 610-838-8381. 
•Christmas Spectacular, Radio City, Dec. 2. $148. St. Joseph's Church, Limeport, Marty, 215-529-4570. 
•"Deck the Halls," American Music Theatre, Nov. 19. $90. Friends of Southern Lehigh Public Library, Mary Ann, 610-282-2731. 
•Christmas Show, American Music Theatre, $79. Dec. 1 or 2. St. Thomas More, Marie, 610-965-9960. 
•Christmas Show, American Music Theatre, Dec. 2. $79. Trinity Memorial Lutheran Church, Judy, 610-797-1466. 
• Brewery tours, Social Still; Sandcastle Winery; Weyerbach Brewery, Nov. 14. $65. Northern Lehigh Community Center, 610-760-0300. 
•"Deck the Halls," Good N' Plenty, Dec. 9. $85. Coplay Seniors, Clara, 610-433-4063. 
•Christmas Show, Hunterdon Hills, Dec. 18. $85. The Morning Call retirees, Phyl, 610-432-9442. 
•Radio City Christmas Spectacular, Dec. 19. $125. Lehigh Valley Yankee Fan Club, Chuck, 484-347-8331. 
•The "Platters" Christmas Show, Mount Airy Casino, Dec. 8. $68. St. Joseph's Women's Guild, Sue, 610-392-2957. 
•Lights & Flowers, tour of Philadelphia, Longwood Gardens, Dec. 1. $89. St. John Fisher and Queenship of Mary churches, Marge, 610-262-3174. 
•New York City DUMBO Foodie trip, West Village, Washington Square Park, Nov. 7. $45. Pennsylvania Christmas & Gift Show, Harrisburg, Dec. 4. $48. New York City, Shopping at Bryant Park, Rockefeller Center, Dec. 7. $45. Morning Angels, Camille, 908-387-0001. 
•A Christmas Show, Woodloch Pines, Dec. 10. $65. Whitehall AARP 3115, Kathy, 610-799-2793. 
•"Good Night Mrs. Puffin," Rainbow's Comedy Playhouse, Nov. 15. $81. Lehigh Township Lioness Club, Geraldine, 610-767-2384. 
•"A Tribute to Our Veterans," Villa Roma Resort, Callicoon, N.Y., Nov. 10. $88. St Anne's 55+ Club, 610-807-9906. 
•" Deck the Halls ," American Music Theater, Nov. 19. $90. Friends of the Southern Lehigh Public Library, Mary Ann, 610-282-2731. 
• Barbra Streisand/Frank Sinatra tribute, Mount Airy, Nov. 10. $58. Christmas Show, Hunterdon Hills, Dec. 16. $88. Allentown AARP Chapter 5415, Jeanne, 610-437-4265. 
• Miracle of Christmas, Sight & Sound, Nov. 19. $92. Christmas Show, American Music Theatre, Dec. 17. $81. New Years in the Afternoon, LiGreci, Dec. 31. $95. School Retirees, Joanne, 610-398-0981. 
• Christmas Spectacular, Radio City, Nov. 14. $125. Communities That Care Whitehall-Coplay Hunger Initiative, Rhonda, 610-266-1995. 
• "Christmas Show," American Music Theatre, Nov. 17. $90. MORA/Lighthouse Travelers, Roland, 610-703-1788. 
•Broadway , choice of "Finding Neverland,""Something Rotten" or "Beautiful," Nov. 18. $150. Lehigh Valley Active Life, 610-437-3700. 
OVERNIGHT TRIPS 
•Springtime in Norfolk, Azalea Festival, Naval Station, Victory Rover Boat Tour, MacArthur Memorial & Mall, International Tattoo, and more, April 21-24. $740. St. Jane's Trips & Tours, Carol, 610-252-4233. 
•Seneca Lake, N.Y., 12 wineries, two continental breakfasts, two lunches, one dinner, May 20-22. $410. Chestnut Hill Church, Debbie, 610-967-1975. 
•Canyon Country Tour, May 23-31. $3,079. Bethlehem YMCA, Gillian, 610-691-7305. 
•Norfolk Azalea Festival, Spirit of Norfolk dinner cruise, Virginia International Tattoo Show, Norfolk Naval base tour, Norfolk Botanical Gardens tour, more, April 21-24. $540. St. Joseph's Prime Time, Florence, 610-797-5452. 
•Southern Caribbean Cruise, six ports, Jan. 17-29. Starting at $1,419. Lower Macungie Seniors, Doris, 610-966-3653. 
• San Antonio, Mission San Jose, the Alamo, LBJ Ranch, Mayan Dude Ranch, May 22-26. $1,819. British Landscapes, England, Scotland, Wales, Edingurgh Castle, Stonehenge, Sept. 3-12. $3,899. School Retirees, Joanne, 610-398-0981. 
• Branson at the Beach, Ocean City, Md., March 21-24. Five shows, three dinners, three breakfasts, more. MORA/Lighthouse Travelers, Roland, 610-703-1788. 
•Pacific Northwest and California, May 29-June 5. $2,999. Assumption Church Travel Club, John, 610-767-3036. 
• Italy, Venice, Padua, Florence, Assisi, Rome, March 29-April 7. $3,890. Most Blessed Sacrament Church, 610-845-2460. 
Sponsored Trips are for nonprofit organizations. Send information two weeks in advance: event, date, cost, phone number. Fax: 610-820-6693; email: news@mcall.com ; mail: Trips, The Morning Call, Box 1260, Allentown, 18105-1260.
